name: 田方治
objective:
MVA 課程之目的在介紹目前機器視覺的架構、發展及現狀，並介紹基本影像處理技術 (DIP)
課程之教學目標包括: 
Objective I: 熟悉 Python + CV2 + PyQt5
Objective II:  熟悉基本數位影像處理之技術 (DIP)
Objective III: 機器視覺相關軟硬體之使用 (CCD、鏡頭、光源)
Objective IV: 加入 深度學習 (AI) 於機器視覺之應用
Objective V: 訓練三種能力: 團隊合作 、解決問題及自我學習

配合個人 Youtube、Delta 影像處理課程、網路deep learning教材，期望同學對於機器視覺的低、中、高階層問題之處理
schedule:
Week 1: 課程大綱簡介 –　MVA、Zuvio 使用方法 – 登入及試用 (使用以下方式)、分組 –  3人一組
Week 2: Introduction to DIP and CV2
Week 3: Sampling & Quantization 
Week 4: Installation & MVC Design、強度轉換 與 空間濾波
Week 5: 頻域轉換與濾波
Week 6: Space Filter
Week 7: Morphology (1 and 2) 
Week 8: Morphology (1 and 2) 
Week 9: Color
Week 10: 影像表示與描述 
Week 11: Contour, bounding box & PyTorch 
Week 12: 影像分割_part 1 、Backpropogation
Week 13: 影像分割  part 2、CNN
Week 14: 影像分割  part 3、Object Detection -- Yolo v5
Week 15: Keypoint detection、Faster RCNN
Week 16: High level MV、Deep Sort、Tracking
Week 17: Final & Paper Reading Presentation
Week 18: Final Project & Competition
scorePolicy:
課堂參與及作業					(35%)
Test (Final: 上機考，Week 17)			(20%)
Project & Compeition – 小組專題實作與報告 (每組30分鐘)	(30%)  
Paper reading and presentation (Week 15) 	(15%)
Book reading (extra points)        			( 5%)
Total (105%)
materials:
本課程主要之教材如下:
Textbooks: 
A: Image Engineering, Processing, Analysis, and Understanding, Zhang, Yu-Jin, Cengage Learning Asia Pte Ltd. 2009.
B:  Digital Image Processing, R.Gonzalez, R.E. Woods, 2nd Edition, Prentice Hall
C: Learning OpenCV, Coumputer Vision with the OpenCV Library, Gary Bradski and Adrian kaehler, O’Reilly (or other OpenCV books)
個人教材 (PPT) + Video
相關網頁: DeltaMooc(數位影像處理，請上網登錄)
